description:
58 million aliens that look exactly like Japanese people immigrate to Japan, causing a serious food shortage. An alien scientist Dohyar plans to take over Japan by making Japanese people small with cell-reducing fluid. 
Source: tezukaosamu.net

titles.title: Uchuu kara Kita Nipponjin no Maki
宇宙から来たニッポン人の巻
